001package com.avaje.ebean.cache;
002
003/**
004 * Represents part of the "L2" server side cache.
005 * <p>
006 * This is used to cache beans or query results (bean collections).
007 * </p>
008 * <p>
009 * There are 2 ServerCache's for each bean type. One is used as the 'bean cache'
010 * which holds beans of a given type. The other is the 'query cache' holding
011 * query results for a given type.
012 * </p>
013 */
014public interface ServerCache {
015
016  /**
017   * Return the value given the key.
018   */
019  Object get(Object id);
020
021  /**
022   * Put the value in the cache with a given id.
023   */
024  Object put(Object id, Object value);
025
026  /**
027   * Remove a entry from the cache given its id.
028   */
029  Object remove(Object id);
030
031  /**
032   * Clear all entries from the cache.
033   */
034  void clear();
035
036  /**
037   * Return the number of entries in the cache.
038   */
039  int size();
040
041  /**
042   * Return the hit ratio the cache is currently getting.
043   */
044  int getHitRatio();
045
046  /**
047   * Return statistics for the cache.
048   *
049   * @param reset if true the statistics are reset.
050   */
051  ServerCacheStatistics getStatistics(boolean reset);
052}
